name: AUTODEAL: a Virtual Automotive Showroom
description:
“Welcome to AUTODEAL everyone!”

Gameplay Demo!

INTRODUCTION:

AUTODEAL is a project which was creatively initiated by Team 3 that consists of three members of FGA: Digitalent Scholarship (DTS) 2023 by KOMINFO RI with Unity 3D Game Engine. It was presented a virtual automotive showroom that allows the user to taking tour the room with Avatar as yours!

FEATURES:

  • Touring a room with 3D Avatar
  • Presenting the vehicles including cars and motorbike
  • Showing up the vehicles on 3D model with AR application on Marker Based AR

CREDITS:

  1. Andar Sulisman (1955651840-386) as 3D Artist
  2. Muthi’ah Azzahra (1955651840-367) as 3D Artist 
  3. Putri Widyasari (1955651840-359) as UI/UX Designer 

We’d like to say big THANKYOU to KOMINFO RI, for giving us a chance on taking this Metaverse Engineer class on learning about building the room on Mozilla Hubs & Spoke, creating our own Unity 3D creation both VR and AR, and to Train4best, as the training institution, for opening this training session, and also to our mentor, Mr. Fery Prasetyanto, for willing to teach us the incredible knowledge patiently and share the experience on live session especially with practicing the Spoke and Unity 3D for creating VR and implementation of AR with Vuforia SDK intensely. Hopefully, this final project could be developed into the better one. 

LANGUAGE:

  • English
  • Indonesian [Not Today..]

Hope you’re enjoy our first debut Metaverse application! :-) THANKYOU! 

(GitHub has attached for source code and our export scenes).
